items.question: Who can join Tranquility?
items.answer: Tranquility is a private, members-only club for adults. Membership is subject to application and approval to ensure a respectful community.

items.question: How do I apply?
items.answer: Start by clicking 'Request Membership' on the site or contacting us via the Contact page. Our team reviews applications and will respond with next steps.

items.question: What should I bring when visiting?
items.answer: Please bring a valid ID for age verification. Follow any event-specific guidance provided during booking.

items.question: Are events private?
items.answer: Yes — events and gatherings are for members only unless explicitly listed as public. Photos or sharing without consent is not permitted.

about.title: About Tranquility
about.subtitle: A peaceful, private community created for adults seeking calm, connection and a safe social environment.
about.missionText: At Tranquility, our mission is to offer a calm, welcoming and responsible environment for adults. We focus on mindfulness, community and well-being — creating a peaceful escape from the noise of everyday life.
about.privateText: Tranquility operates strictly as a private, members-only social association in accordance with local regulations. Entry is reserved for approved adults, ensuring privacy, safety and responsible participation at all times.
about.noteText: We are not open to the general public — membership is required to access the club.
about.experienceText: Inside our space, members can enjoy a peaceful lounge atmosphere, respectful community and a beautifully designed environment meant to promote relaxation and mindfulness.

respect.title: Respect
respect.desc: for people, time, space and well-being.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.desc: discretion is a core part of our culture.

about.joinText: We welcome responsible adults who value calm, privacy and connection.

membership.title: Membership
membership.subtitle: & Access
membership.lead: Learn how to apply, what membership includes and how we keep our community safe and private.
membership.howToApplyText: Start by requesting membership using the button above. Our team reviews applications to ensure alignment with our community values and eligibility criteria.

list: Complete the application form and provide valid ID.
Share a short statement about why you want to join.
Wait for review — response times typically range from 2–7 days.

membership.benefitsText: Members gain access to private events, a calm lounge space, curated learning sessions and a respectful community of peers.
membership.feesText: Membership involves a fee which helps sustain the space and programming. Fees and refund policies are provided during the application process.

rules.title: Club Rules
guidelines: Respect others: treat members and staff with courtesy and consideration at all times.
Privacy first: do not share personal information or photos of other members without consent.
Responsible conduct: illegal activities and disruptive behavior are strictly prohibited.
Age restriction: the club is for approved adults only. Always carry proof of age when requested.
Safety: follow staff instructions and venue safety guidelines.
rules.admissionText: Membership applications are reviewed to ensure a safe and respectful community. Admission may be refused or membership revoked at the discretion of the club for violations.
rules.enforcementText: Staff are empowered to enforce rules and may ask members to leave if necessary. Serious breaches may result in permanent bans and legal action.

contact.title: Contact Tranquility
contact.subtitle: Have questions or want to apply? Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.description: Tranquility is a private members-only club focused on wellbeing, curated events and a respectful community. Located in Torremolinos, Málaga, we prioritise privacy and responsible enjoyment.

legal.termsIntro: Welcome to Tranquility. By accessing or using our website and services you agree to these Terms of Service.
legal.privacyIntro: Tranquility is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains what information we collect, how we use it and your rights.

using.title: Using Our Service
using.text: Tranquility provides a private-members club experience with information about events, membership and contact options. You agree to use the site lawfully and not to attempt to disrupt services or access restricted areas.

noSale.title: No Sale of Goods
noSale.text: We do not sell any physical or digital products through this website.

liability.title: Liability
liability.text: The information on this site is provided "as is" and for general information only. Tranquility makes no warranties about the completeness or accuracy of this information and disclaims liability for damages arising from use of the site, to the fullest extent permitted by law.

privacy.collectText: We may collect contact information you provide (name, email, phone), communications you send to us and technical data such as browser and device information when you visit our website. We collect only what is necessary to provide our services.
privacy.useText: We use personal data to respond to inquiries, manage membership requests, send important notices and improve our services. We do not use personal data for automated profiling or sell personal information.
privacy.noSale: We do not sell your personal information.
privacy.cookiesText: We may use cookies and similar technologies to operate the website and understand usage. You can control cookies via your browser settings.
privacy.rightsText: Depending on your jurisdiction you may have rights to access, correct, export, or delete your personal data. To exercise these rights contact us at {email}.
privacy.securityText: We retain personal data only as long as necessary and use reasonable administrative and technical safeguards to protect it. No method of transmission over the Internet is completely secure; we cannot guarantee absolute security.
